name: Shooting Stars (Vittorio Belleri)
description:
Hello everyone! This is my first game, I hope you enjoy it!

Your goal is to destroy the meteors before they hit the ground or otherwise you will loose health. Sometimes meteors drop hearts, which you can destroy to gain some health.

Please leave a comment about any problems you had, any bugs I can fix, any suggestions you have to improve the game and tell me if you liked it or not.
